tech_news.title: Arcade1Up isn’t dead, maybe - The Verge
tech_news.description: Toy company Basic Fun is acquiring “select assets” of Arcade1Up, according to a statement. Last week, a rumor surfaced that Arcade1Up would be “closing operations.”

tech_news.title: The Google app is intentionally replacing Pixel Launcher search - 9to5Google
tech_news.description: In the past few days, tapping the Pixel Launcher search bar opens a different screen powered by the Google app. This is not a bug...

tech_news.title: Alexa Plus’ website is live for some users - The Verge
tech_news.description: The website for Amazon’s AI-powered voice assistant previously redirected to an information page. For some users, it’s now more like an Alexa Plus web interface.

tech_news.title: Samsung’s 2026 Micro RGB LED TVs can actually fit in your living room - The Verge
tech_news.description: The new TVs will range in size from 55 to 100 inches, but pricing details are yet to be released.

tech_news.title: I finally found an at-home device that alleviates my arthritis in just 20 minutes. Here’s how it works - CNN
tech_news.description: I tested the Chirp Halo wireless muscle stimulator for two months. Here’s how the at-home EMS and TENS device helped with my chronic pain, plus my honest opinion about it.

tech_news.title: BG3 studio Larian says it's using genAI for Divinity, but not 'looking at trimming down teams to replace them' - Polygon
tech_news.description: Divinity, the next game from Baldur's Gate 3 devs Larian, employs AI and machine learning, but not at the expense of creators, Swen Vincke says.

tech_news.title: NotebookLM rolls out chat history, adds AI Ultra tier - 9to5Google
tech_news.description: After announcing in October, NotebookLM has fully rolled out chat history, while Google AI Ultra subscribers now have expanded usage limits.

tech_news.title: Apple headphones don't get cheaper than this: EarPods are down to just $11 - Yahoo! Tech
tech_news.description: Tired of charging things? These corded headphones will work with iPhones and iPads both old and new.

tech_news.title: 4 Electronics You Should Only Buy From Amazon - bgr.com
tech_news.description: Consumers should buy smart TVs, Kindle devices, laptops, and Amazon Basics products from Amazon before any competitors, based on price and return policies.

tech_news.title: 10 Best 3D Printing Projects For Beginners - bgr.com
tech_news.description: A few years ago, 3D printing sounded like science fiction. Today, there are thousands of beginner-friendly designs perfect for learning the basics.
